attributes.action: Pakistan to be removed from the red list, cases compared to Europe are very low.
attributes.additional_details: We urge the Uk government to provide reasons for adding Pakistan to the red list. Also Pakistan should be removed from red list as cases are very low compared to other countries not on the red list.
attributes.background: Pakistan has been added to the red list, there are many countries who have higher cases than Pakistan but are not on the red list. India, France, Germany and many other countries have high rates of COVID but are not on red list.
